name: Splunk IT Service Intelligence
description: This app integrates with Splunk IT Service Intelligence to provide operations on Splunk IT Service Intelligence episodes, services, entities, and object maintenance

base_url.description: Splunk ITSI Search Head Base URL

port.description: Splunk ITSI Search Head Management Port

relative_start_time.description: Relative start time in seconds. To start maintenance window now - 0, to start maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to start maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

relative_end_time.description: Relative end time in seconds. To end maintenance window in 1 min from now - 60, to end maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to end maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

relative_start_time.description: Relative start time in seconds. To start maintenance window now - 0, to start maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to start maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

relative_end_time.description: Relative end time in seconds. To end maintenance window in 1 min from now - 60, to end maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to end maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

actions.description: Get Splunk ITSI maintenance window information
Get entities of a Splunk ITSI service
Get ticket information for a Splunk ITSI episode
Add a ticket to a Splunk ITSI episode
Get latest events for Splunk ITSI episode

earliest_time.description: Earliest time to search. Select from the drop down or enter relative time modifiers - -60m for 60 minutes ago, -24h for 24 hours ago. Ref: https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/8.0.1/Search/Specifytimemodifiersinyoursearch

max_results.description: Max results retrieved by the search

itsi_policy_id.description: Splunk ITSI notable event aggregation policy ID
Splunk ITSI notable event aggregation policy ID

actions.description: Add a comment to a Splunk ITSI episode
Update Splunk ITSI episode status, severity and owner
Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
